other_tests.findings: Missense mutation of the MCT8 gene was detected.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Tachycardia abated to 84 beats/min after treatment.

other_tests.findings: REE increased from 881 kcal (predicted 931 kcal) at baseline to 1160 kcal after PTU and 1207 kcal on PTU plus LT4.
other_tests.changes_over_time: REE increased, but remained correlated to predicted values; no significant influence on REE from PTU or LT4 treatments.
